name: Vegeteble Mysterez
description:
There's been a Muuuurrrrrddeeeeerrrr in the kitchen! 

There's animations, there's music, and there's murder!!!!!

Revisit your old friends the "Vegeteblez" in this classic who-done-it tale!

Feedback is welcomed and appreciated!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

By Scoot o' Speed Studios (@scoot_o)
